name: Fox Game Prototype
description:
Explore the forest

Fox Game Prototype is a metroidvania game in its early stage of development about a fox that had to flee from its village because of an obscure threat, inspired by Hollow Knight and Ori and The Blind Forest.

Development

The purpose of this demo is to test the game mechanics, it currently only features the first area without any information about the story. The fate of the project is currently unknown and will vary depending on the feedback the prototype receives.

Controls

Movement with WASD:

  • Left and right: A, D
  • Up and down: W, S
  • Jump: Space
  • Attack: Left mouse button (click at the right time to chain attacks and deal more damage)
  • Bow attack: Right mouse button
  • Use 'up' and 'down' to interact with objects

Movement with arrow keys:

  • Left and right: Left and right arrows
  • Up and down: Up and down arrows
  • Jump: Z
  • Attack: X (press at the right time to chain attacks and deal more damage)
  • Bow attack: F
  • Use 'up' and 'down' to interact with objects
